name: Thanks for reading
author: Meskat Jahan

sections.description: This plugin add some line at the end of posts like say thank you for reading my post..Hope you enjoy this. New post are coming soon. Stay tuned
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?> in your templates
sections.faq: If you have any question just mail me meskat.jahan@gmail.com

short_description: Thanks for reading is an awesome and super lightweight plugin for your wordpress website. By installing this plugin we can save your time.
